name: Domus (3D scene test 0.1)
description:
Just a little scene where you can walk on. 

It doesn't have an ending or events. 

I'm making this scene as a way to learn unity and experiment with functions and stuff like that. Not planned to be a full release. 

Press ESC to close.

Custom Textures by @LunaAyArts and Vikintor

3D Models: Vikintor

Other textures from Silent Hill.

Retro Shader by @leakyfingers

Follow me on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/vf_vikintor
